::KitKat::

She listened to Megatron. "Thank you, I'm sure this will be the start 
of the new PREDACON EMIRE here on earth.  I shall contact you later 
on." She closed that part of her link and reopened it to the 
others."LEt Hell Beast go. I have other plans."

She then heard Aracnia. She smiled,"My dear friend.  I am in need of 
your council. Please, follow me to the conference room. We have much 
to discuss."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Hell Beast looked to Manterror, and as he began to speak, two 
large arms 
> grabbed him and pulled him into darkness. Nighteyes was there two, 
she 
> slipped inside in the confusion.  Shuffleing around he realized he 
had been 
> pulled into the ship. With a quick flick of his wrist he slide a 
daggar out 
> of his wrist and dug it deep into whoever was holding him.
>     "AH, Starscream, alas Im sorry to have stabbed you but I have 
my own 
> agenda to execute. Good bye!" He said, and fired two optic b;lasts 
at the 
> bot, then running down the corridor insearch of what he needed.
>     Nighteyes looked at Starscream and then fired a missle after 
Hell Beast. 
> "Starscream, are you ok? Dont worry, he wont last long in here!"
> 
>     Megatron, now a safe distance from the autoguns thought the 
message over. 
> And he agreed. A council was just the thing to end the MAximal 
reign of 
> goodness. Predacon athorioty needed to be exercised.
>     "Kitkat, Megatron here, I accept your offer....but, do return 
Hell Beast. 
> I would hate to have to destroy your ship to get him back."
> 
>     Aracnia, Rampage, Tankkor, and Paralysis made there way to the 
ship. 
> Aracnia looked around, "Kitkat, were here."
